entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being upset and miserable about his pet rat Scabbers.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat who has been described as being off-color and wasting away. It is suggested that it would be better for him to die quickly.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as trying to cheer up Ron by making jokes about Scabbers.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being indignant on behalf of Ron when Fred makes a joke about Scabbers.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as agreeing with Ginny that Scabbers was not very interesting.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as having been bitten by Scabbers in the past.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as remembering that Goyle was bitten by Scabbers and trying to cheer up Ron.

relationships.description: Ron owns Scabbers, his pet rat.
Fred is trying to cheer up Ron by making jokes about Scabbers.
Ginny is supporting Ron and disagreeing with Fred's joke about Scabbers.
George dislikes Scabbers and agrees with Ginny that it was not very interesting.
Goyle was bitten by Scabbers in the past.
Harry is trying to cheer up Ron and remembers that Goyle was bitten by Scabbers.
